attributes.action: Make lies to the population in order to win a referendum a culpable offence.
attributes.additional_details: It has become evident in the days following( and preceeding) the Referendum, that the British public has been fed a diet of numerous lies. I want the individuals concerned to be held culpable instead of allowed to forge ahead wreaking more havoc to the United (at present) Kingdom.
attributes.background: I have been outraged that no proper action has been taken against the lies to the British public by supposedly responsible leaders of the Leave Campaign.
